title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply and take effect as
prescribed in article 8 of the Environmental Conservation Law. The authority
shall maintain a list of those policies and programs that it undertakes or
carries out, which according to this Part, are "actions" that may have a
significant effect on the environment. Program environmental impact statements
(PEIS) of such actions shall be prepared according to this Part by the
authority in keeping with the availability of existing staff and
resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2500.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
